Welcome to SparkzLab!

Sparkz-lab is a summer program which guides students through the transition from High School to University. We help students identify their strengths, discover their talents and clarify career options by introducing them to business professionals and high ranked university professors. Sparkz-lab combines Technology, International Economics and Intercultural management to create a unique summer program experience.

If you like what you see, contact us?

    SparkzLab is born! Our aim is to teach you international skills
